ModMetaData.name: RimFlix
ModMetaData.author: aznplucky (original author), Jelly (1.3 update and changes), Sokyran (custom TV support)
ModMetaData.description:
Create shows from custom images and play them on television screens.
Players: • Display images and photos from your computer on your RimWorld televisions! • Adjust timings to create smooth animations or simple slideshows. • Manually control which shows play, or allow pawns to change shows themselves. • Play shows continuously or only when pawns are watching. • Optionally adjust power consumption of TVs when being watched vs. idle.
Artists and Animators: • Create and share shows with the RimWorld community! • No coding required. Just create your images and XML file, then upload to Steam Workshop. • See https://github.com/ritsu/RimFlix-Anime-Loops for an exmaple.
Modders: • Add support for your own TVs! • Check Patch_RimFlix.xml to see how it's done to vanilla and Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module TVs. • Examples coming in the future.
